name: hyperledger-app
description: Webapplication built on top of Hyperledger Fabric

scripts.install: npm run getbaseimage && npm run govend && docker-compose pull && docker-compose build
scripts.getbaseimage: docker pull hyperledger/fabric-baseimage:x86_64-0.2.2 && docker tag hyperledger/fabric-baseimage:x86_64-0.2.2 hyperledger/fabric-baseimage:latest
scripts.govend: docker-compose run utils bash -c 'cd blockchain/src/build-chaincode && GOPATH=$(pwd)/../.. govend -rv' && sudo chown -R $USER blockchain
scripts.test-go: docker-compose run utils bash -c 'cd blockchain/src/build-chaincode && GOPATH=$(pwd)/../.. go test'
scripts.test-server: docker-compose build server && docker-compose run server bash -c 'npm test'
scripts.test-e2e: docker-compose exec server bash -c 'npm run e2e'
scripts.test: npm -s run test-server && npm -s run test-go
scripts.cf: docker build --tag cf . && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/server/resources:/usr/src/app/server/resources cf

author: IBM Client Innovation Center Benelux
